manifest.name: postcss-normalize-charset
manifest.description: Add necessary or remove extra charset with PostCSS
manifest.readme:
# postcss-normalize-charset

Add necessary or remove extra charset with PostCSS

```css
a{
  content: "©";
}
```

```css
@charset "utf-8";
a{
  content: "©";
}
```

## API

### normalizeCharset([options])

#### options

##### add

Type: `boolean`  
Default: `true`

Pass `false` to stop the module from adding a `@charset` declaration if it was
missing from the file (and the file contained non-ascii characters).

## Usage

See the [PostCSS documentation](https://github.com/postcss/postcss#usage) for
examples for your environment.
